page.title: 05Traditions
page.content: 3 sayings from the area. "If there are 2 funerals in a week then there will be three in the fortnight.""A green Christmas makes a full churchyard." If some-one fails to do something properly then a sympathetic by-stander may well say "Tha' didna' hod tha' moth reet." ie "you didn't hold your mouth in the correct way for that particular job." Pilling Coffee Feast now resembles the local Galas (pronunced "gaylas") like Preesall Gala.In the past it centred round the church.Now there is a Rose Queen,a procession,sports,morris dancing,and lots to eat for the children.The origin is medieval,a survival of the village "feast" to celebrate the Saint's Day of the parish church.A couple of Centuries ago it was the custom to give children coffee to eat with their buns,hence the name.
